plot: Lost inside his head, unable to leave his apartment, a man is visited by a vision of a woman who transports to various places in an effort to free him from the cage he has built.
title: Stream
plot_es: Lost inside his head, unable to leave his apartment, a man is visited by a vision of a woman who transports to various places in an effort to free him from the cage he has built.
